      StatBar​(boolean isChargeBar)

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatBar

        public StatBar​(boolean isChargeBar)
        Creates a generic StatBar, which can either be a rectangular health bar or a circular ability charge bar. It has a set maximum and set current value.
        Parameters:
        isChargeBar - True if an ability charge bar is wanted, false otherwise.

      • StatBar

        public StatBar​(boolean isChargeBar,
               int width,
               int height,
               int borderWidth,
               int maxVal,
               int currVal)
        Creates a StatBar, which is either a rectangular health bar or a circular ability charge bar, of the specified width and height, and with a specified maximum and current value.
        Parameters:
        isChargeBar - True for ability charge bar, false otherwise
        width - Width of the StatBar
        height - Height of the StatBar
        borderWidth - Width of the border of the StatBar. Only applies to rectangular health bars and is ignored by circular ability charge bars.
        maxVal - Maximum possible value of the StatBar.
        currVal - Current value of the StatBar.

      • StatBar

        public StatBar​(int width,
               int height,
               int borderWidth,
               int maxVal,
               int currVal,
               greenfoot.Color filledColor,
               greenfoot.Color emptyColor,
               greenfoot.Color borderColor,
               greenfoot.Color updateDownColor,
               greenfoot.Color updateUpColor)
        Creates a rectangular health bar (one of the two types of StatBars).
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the StatBar
        height - Height of the StatBar
        borderWidth - Width of the border of the StatBar.
        maxVal - Maximum possible value of the StatBar.
        currVal - Current value of the StatBar.
        filledColor - Colour of the filled up portion of a rectangular health bar.
        emptyColor - Colour of the empty portion of a rectangular health bar.
        borderColor - Colour of the border of a rectangular health bar.
        updateDownColor - Colour of the animation for health loss.
        udateUpColor - Colour of the animation for health gain.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Act - do whatever the StatBar wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • update

        public void update​(int newVal)
        Updates the StatBar's current value with a new value. Also updates the appearance of the StatBar accordingly.
        Parameters:
        newVal - New value to update the StatBar with.

      • update

        public void update​(int newVal,
                   int newMax)
        Updates the StatBar's current value and current maximum value with new values. Also updates the appearance of the StatBar accordingly.
        Parameters:
        newVal - New value to update the StatBar with.
        newMax - New maximum value to update the StatBar with.

      • useAbility

        public void useAbility()
        Tells circular ability charge bars that the ability has been used (essentially flags an ability as used and resets its charge). Only allows the ability to be used when the current charge is equal to the bar's maximum charge value.
